attributes.action: Break our Laws, Lose Your Visa
attributes.additional_details:
Quite simple really, if you are not a citizen of the UK i.e. you are on a work visa, temporary visa, applying for citizenship, applying for asylum or working as a diplomat etc you must follow our laws.
Any breaking of our laws whether its assault, fraud, murder or driving without a licence instantly revokes your visa and you have 30 days to leave the country.  No second chances, no revokes, no human rights arguments.  You broke my human right to a safe environment you lose your right to stay in our country.
